Uses of Package
extensions

Packages that use extensions
extensions   
project   
 

Classes in extensions used by extensions
AMLabel
          This is my extension of the JLabel Required because we need to store additional information with the label Rather than store the information in a another data structure use the labels We need them for operations so it make sense to keep the information together
AMPanel
          A custom panel Used to speed up painting on load
AMScrollPane
          A custom scroll panel Used to speed up the painting on load
Panel_Controller
          The panel controller has the buttons that can be used by the user to move panels and do other things At the moments the movement is actually taken care by the view This is because the panel has no idea where it is within the frame The frame can be vertical or horizontal, depending on the action performed or user choice
 

Classes in extensions used by project
AMLabel
          This is my extension of the JLabel Required because we need to store additional information with the label Rather than store the information in a another data structure use the labels We need them for operations so it make sense to keep the information together
FixedGlassPane
           
Hierarchy
          Generic hierarchy class Contains all of the elements that are required for a hierarchy in the display This allows multiple hierarchy's to be added easily with all of the elements Also a change can be easily made for all hierarchies
QueryView
          This query view allows advanced users to have advanced queries of the data At this stage it is not properly implemented
